nodes.label: let st = & mut ctx . accounts . state ;
st . authority = ctx . accounts . authority . key () ;
let st = & mut ctx . accounts . state ;

while i < rounds { if st . toggle_external { system_program :: transfer (CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . system_program . to_account_info () , SysTransfer { from : ctx . accounts . payer . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . recipient . to_account_info () , } ,) , st . unit_lamports) ? ; } if ! st . toggle_external { token :: transfer (CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , SplTransfer { from : ctx . accounts . source_tokens . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . dest_tokens . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . authority . to_account_info () , } ,) , st . unit_tokens) ? ; } st . toggle_external = ! st . toggle_external ; i = i . saturating_add (1) ; }

if st . toggle_external { system_program :: transfer (CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . system_program . to_account_info () , SysTransfer { from : ctx . accounts . payer . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . recipient . to_account_info () , } ,) , st . unit_lamports) ? ; }

system_program :: transfer (CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . system_program . to_account_info () , SysTransfer { from : ctx . accounts . payer . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . recipient . to_account_info () , } ,) , st . unit_lamports) ? ;

if ! st . toggle_external { token :: transfer (CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , SplTransfer { from : ctx . accounts . source_tokens . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . dest_tokens . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . authority . to_account_info () , } ,) , st . unit_tokens) ? ; }

token :: transfer (CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , SplTransfer { from : ctx . accounts . source_tokens . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . dest_tokens . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . authority . to_account_info () , } ,) , st . unit_tokens) ? ;
